title: 3 states are challenging precedent against posting the Ten Commandments in public schools – cases that could land back at the Supreme Court
description: New laws mandating the Ten Commandments’ display in schools have faced lawsuits in Texas, Louisiana and Arkansas.
content:
Students work under posters of the Ten Commandments and the Bill of Rights in a high school classroom in Kyle, Texas, on Oct. 16, 2025. AP Photo/Eric Gay
